alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 7:23PM MDT until June 23 at 8:15PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Weld County in northeastern Colorado... Northern Morgan County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 815 PM MDT. * At 722 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles north of Jackson Reservoir, or 24 miles northwest of Fort Morgan, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... New Raymer and Stoneham. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
